solution_line_template: The total donuts Gamma and Beta have is {total_donuts_initial} - {delta_donuts} = <<{total_donuts_initial}-{delta_donuts}={donuts_for_beta_gamma}>>{donuts_for_beta_gamma} donuts.
If we divide both sides by {division_coefficient}, we get x = {gamma_donuts}, so Gamma has {gamma_donuts} donuts.
